results.title: Valmik Thapar, India's 'tiger man', dies at 73 after battling cancer - India Today
results.description: Valmik Thapar, India’s renowned conservationist and widely known as the country’s ‘Tiger Man’, passed away at the age of 73 on Saturday morning at his Kautilya Marg residence in Delhi. He had been battling cancer.
